website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use kidney supplement that you can add to the cat's food. Doesn't interfere with other treatments.
pros: Works to support healthier renal functions in cats, while also helping cats maintain a healthy coat
Has a longer shelf life than most supplements
cons: Some cats may have a skin irritation or a mild allergic reaction to the supplement

customer_reviews.title: Not for high protein diets
customer_reviews.text: On the website it says that this compliments a low protien diet which is most common with cats who have chronic kidney disease. However there is a lot of misinformation about this so my cat has a low phos, high protein diet. I tried to email the manufacturer from the website about this but got no response. On a high protein diet cats are already getting plenty of these amino acids. If you add this supplement it becomes too much, especially an overdose of L-Arginine is not good. My cat started stinking like ammonia until I took her off. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: The Artist Formerly Known as ʢ

customer_reviews.title: Saved many of our cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: We run a rescue and have returned every cat with kidney failure back to normal kidney values.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I brought my ailing cat home from the vet after her diagnosis of kidney failure, expecting to have to watch her continue her sad decline. A friend told me about Aminivast so I figured "What do I have to lose?". I began to administer it along with Epakitin, a liquid homeopathic treatment, & SQ fluids. Soon there seemed to be a slight improvement and I was cautiously optimistic. Now, one month later, she is so much better! She is alert, has a great appetite, has gained weight and seems much stronger and more vital. While there's no cure, this has drastically improved her quality of life and I am so grateful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shmegege

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Convenient to use. My cat has a good appetite and no nausea when I use this. If I happen to miss a day due to scheduling, he does get lethargic and nausea. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: My cat is doing better with it.  That's all that matters.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My cat was diagnosed with 3rd stage kidney disease and this was suggested by the vet. She had lost a lot of weight. She has now gained some weight back, and the cost here was less than half of what I paid at first at the vet. Just leave yourself enough time for shipping, but would gladly suggest others use it, if your cat or dog have a problem. Certainly better than losing a good friend before their time.
customer_reviews.author: Arty B.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product! I spent $7500 on my cat and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I spent $7500 on my cat and 3 vets still told me to put her down. I found out about Aminavast from pet rescue people and now my cat is so much better! Also started my 16 year old cat on Aminavast and his kidney values are improved. The vets are amazed my kitty is alive and doing great! God bless the man who invented Aminavast. I was told it is a man in CA. I thank God for him and this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: This supplement saved my pet !
customer_reviews.text: My poor, senior dog stopped eating, he was losing weight rapidly and was very lethargic. We rushed him to the hospital and he was hospitalized for several days. He was diagnosed with Kidney Disease. The doctor explained that due to his age, (age 14) he was more vulnerable to this disease. Per the doctot's orders, he was prescribed this, twice a day. Now, 6 months later, he is vibrant, eating without any coaxing, back to his old self. This has been extremely helpful. We know that he continues with a good quality of life !
customer_reviews.author: judy han

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ridiculous price hike
customer_reviews.text: While we're still skeptical about the testing for actual "kidney support" claims of this product, we do see a difference in our CKD cat's energy and appetite after using this product for about a month now. And it certainly isn't unsafe or doing cats any harm ... it's just some amino acids and a peptide. We're definitely going to keep using it. With that said, I'm only giving this four stars because of the unreasonable price hike. In less than a month it's gone from $19.99 to now $29.99! I'm now searching other sites for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Lachesisx

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works or not.
customer_reviews.text: So, my vet recommended that I start feeding my cat food with kidney-support. Woh my, have you seen those prices? I came across this item so I thought I'd try it first. Not sure if this is just coincidence, but after about a week I noticed my cat having all sorts of sores and scabs over her. I stopped giving this to her, and a few days later there are no new sores or scabs, and the ones she did have mostly have healed up. Again, not sure if this is just a coincidence, but am afraid to keep giving it to her just to find out in case she develops something more serious.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Vomiting and Itching/gnawing stopped
customer_reviews.text: I gave my cat with kidney disease this product in late July, when he was still vomiting a few times a week and itching/gnawing almost continuously (which caused him to have skin abrasion patches where there was no fur and less fur overall on his body). Shortly after taking this product, my cat stopped vomiting and itching. Now he has a very beautiful fur coat, which proves to me that AminAvast removes harmful undetected toxins from the blood. I would definitely recommend this product to others, after seeing such wonderful results.
customer_reviews.author: sushanta

customer_reviews.title: My cat still alives
customer_reviews.text: When I protected my cat, her BUN exceeded 100 and CRE was 3.6. Fortunately she survived, so I initially administered Azodyl. But in Japan, Azodyl can not be obtained normally. Moreover, since it is necessary to store at low temperature, it was difficult to bring it back from the United States. At that time I knew AminAvast and switched from Azodyl since 2014. She is still fine now.
customer_reviews.author: kumakuma

customer_reviews.title: *Buyer Beware! NO Seal on-Returning!*
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today and the bottle did NOT have an internal foil seal like all the other bottles of this product I’ve bought during the last 5 years AND when I pealed the shipper’s item label to reveal the mfg date of 12/2017 but there was no expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: TriCat

customer_reviews.title: Just sprinkle and go.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy giving her AminAvast, before then I was giving her Azodyl, and that had to be shipped cold and put in the fridge right after, Then they wanted you to put the capsules down the throat and the cost was a lot higher because it had to be shipped overnight. This I can sprinkle it in her food twice a day, no need to put it in the fridge. I do see her appetite and energy increase a little with AminAvast. This was recommended by her Vet. So far, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Our cat feels better now
customer_reviews.text: About 18 months ago our 16 year old male got sick. The vet said he had a viral infection, and treated him for it. He got better, but the vet cautioned that his kidney function was borderline, not surprising considering his age. he came home, and I decided to do some research to see if a supplement would help him. I found that fellow cat owners were highly recommending both Nutri-Vet Multi-Vite Paw-Gel for Cats, and AminAvast Kidney Support Supplement for Cats . So I bought both, and give him a little of each, alternating between them on a daily basis. A year and a half later he is still with us, seems healthy, and full of the devil.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Provided some help for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a couple of months for my cat with kidney disease. The results are in. SDMA increased, however her BUN and Creat decreased. It seems likely the product is helping her cope with failing kidneys so I will continue to use it. Her appetite and activity level have improved a bit.
customer_reviews.author: rmily

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years for my 17 year old cat who has had kidney problems for almost 2 1/2 years. It was recommended by my veterinarian and seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s literally a vitamin capsule
customer_reviews.text: It’s a capsule the size of an average human vitamn. Might be able to get a dog to eat it by hiding it in some food, but no way I can force feed a pill that size to my cat twice a day. I open a capsule and tried sprinkling it on her food and she just ate around it. I mixed it in with her food and she refused to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oak

customer_reviews.title: Easy kidney pill for cats
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our 23-1/2 year old cat who has chronic kidney disease. It is so easy to give to her. Just sprinkle it on her food. She loves the taste and it helps ensure she finishes her food. We also give her prescription medication such as Azodyl but she often vomits actual pills up and we find those when we get home from work. With Aminavast we know she’s eaten the nutrients needed for her kidney function.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F Devol

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders on my 17 year old cat...vet said she thought she would have been gone by now.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Nana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Just finished first bottle. My cat was just on the border of having kidney issues after my vet had ran some testing and her numbers were low. This has increased her energy and appetite and mood in general. I only give her one pill with her breakfast since she was just one the border. I am happy to know that this has prevented anything from getting worse. I'm shocked how bug of a difference it made and is such an affordable treatment over constantly going to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Karar

customer_reviews.title: They are eating better!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Azodyl for years for my cats in renal failure and still do. Have added this and have noticed immediately that the cats start eating better and seem to have a little more energy. Bought a couple more bottles as I have several cats in kidney failure.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Original product saved my dogs life! This is the same stuff and helps my cat tremendously.
customer_reviews.text: Kidneys are the first thing to go on a dog or cat this was recommended to me by my holistic vet for my senior dog years ago and it worked immediately to stop him from urinating in the house frequently. He wore a diaper but this kept him going till age 20 and he was a very large dog about 65 lbs. Works quickly and helps tremendously with unwanted urination problems if kidney related. My senior cat is now taking them and it works for her too. After having a UTI I wanted something natural to help heal her. I only give her one a day instead of two. She's very tiny. They are pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: moxieann

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement and cats love it
customer_reviews.text: As a cat shelter manager with two geriatric cats in early renal failure in our facility it was a blessing to be able to get our product delivered in a timely fashion during the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic. Thank you from Pete and Squeaky! So, great seller, with excellent correspondence and updates. We're happy to do business with you!! On to the product. I don't know what's in it, but the powder in these capsules must be mighty tasty. We do not mix it in; we simply pour it atop wet food and they devour it. Have used this on 6 cats, feeding in this fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Blonde

customer_reviews.title: I think it helped save my cat's life!
customer_reviews.text: This product was initially prescribed to my cat because she has a hyperthyroid issue and it affected her kidneys. Show the vet recommended and prescribed this for me and I used to get it from him but I changed the vet and that that doesn't sell this product. Now I get it from Amazon and I think this product help shave my cat's life at least prolong it. I can't say enough good things about AmniVast for cats
customer_reviews.author: Debora Weksler

customer_reviews.title: Correct size Capsules finally arrived
customer_reviews.text: I like that it arrived. What I don't like is the bottle label which led me to buy the wrong size capsule. I have a small dog (12lbs), and naturally I bought the bottle that had a picture of a dog ; However when it arrived I read the label which gives me dosages for only 20lbs dogs and the capsules were 1000mg. To use it for my little dog, I had to break each large capsule into 3 smaller capsules. A total Drag! I then ordered the correct capsule: 300 mg which has a picture of a cat on the label. And finally the 300 mg capsules arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Tung

customer_reviews.title: Review is for Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend AbsolutelyPets as a vendor. Product was within months of expiration. Although the Amazon listing states a shelf life of 2 years, Absolutely Pets wrote me stating it had a shelf life of 10 years. Come on... customers DO do their research..no need to falsely represent the product. The product itself seems to be helping my 20+ cat. Just need to find another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: FLnative

customer_reviews.title: Good GEORGE ALIVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped our almost 20 year old feline. He has thyroid issues and this supplement helps his kidneys and does not affect the topical compound meds. So glad I found this product for GEORGE.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was already giving my precious cat azodyl for a long time which helped a lot, but I wanted to add something else to help her more. This stuff has increased her appetite and she also seems to be feeling better. It only took about 1 week for me to start seeing the benefits. I love that this can be sprinkled on the food unlike azodyl (but azodyl is also great and still recommend to go with this)
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for four years on my cat and his kidney numbers increased and he at 18 is looking great and acting like a much younger cat.
customer_reviews.author: Granbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Keeping our cat alive at 19
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about 5 months now. We have a 19 year old cat and I think this is definitely helping to keep her alive. A lot cheaper than what the vet was trying to sell us.
customer_reviews.author: doogiedw

customer_reviews.title: my 17 yr old cat  with ckd is eating and came alive
customer_reviews.text: this product is wonderful...my 17 yr old cat is eating and lively..highly recommend if your cat has ckd...such an improvement in less than two weeks..he is was 7 lbs but is gaining...also use pet well being kidney support and epakatin ..however didn't see real changes until this product..before this gave him a gel a few times a day to increase his appetite and he did not like it and did not really help....love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ronee M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to have improved my 13 year old kitty’s health. When she was diagnosed with kidney disease a few months ago I searched for something to help her. Her appetite has been great and she has more pep in her step!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Kidney disease remedy for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to my kitty for a year now. He is 17 and has CKD. I use this with other pet remedies such as turmeric and probiotic, plus B supplementation (renal K gel), and pet CBD for pain. I feel like his condition has stabilized. I know the disease will get him eventually, but he seems comfortable and still has a sense of whimsy, even as he gets older. That's all I can hope for!
customer_reviews.author: amber c

customer_reviews.title: Part of My Kitty's Daily Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this along side other therapies for several months now. I had only been using vet purchased items for a couple years now, but I felt it wasn't enough. I combine this daily with the vet therapy and a few other supplements and my kitty is back to being a bit more like her old self. Do your furry friend a solid and research this as well as some other items - your kitty will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Az

customer_reviews.title: He's still doing great.
customer_reviews.text: My cat has had kidney disease for over 4 years. This is one of the supplements he takes. He's still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mautino

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with kidney failure
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to help with kidney problems - though I could be fooling myself. I've used it on a small dog and two cats with approaching kidney failure and I think it extended their lives and made them more comfortable. Down side: it's expensive though a lot cheaper on Amazon that from other sellers or a vet.
customer_reviews.author: Smerdley

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Drug!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Kitty didn’t object to any taste differences with her food and her kidney readings were back to normal after using it for a month!
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyCub

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Our poor CKD cat got violently ill using this product as suggested. He has since passed away and we thoroughly regret putting him thru the added misery caused by this product in his last weeks.
customer_reviews.author: joejoe

customer_reviews.title: Has greatly helped our renal failure kitty for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty was in stage 3 renal failure and vet said she would not live long without treatment. We started her on AminAvast and Epakitin and her kidney tests actually improved and haven't progressed or worsened at all. We also give her subcutaneous fluid twice weekly. It's been 2 years and she is doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sues

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've done for my cat!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat was diagnosed with end stage renal failure. I thought I was going to lose him. He was throwing up, dehydrated, refused to eat and barely moved. Within two weeks of starting him on this and Enpatikin he improved . He is now eating (weruva cat food), drinking water, and much more active. He's even hanging out in our backyard like he used to. He is not back to normal but he has improved so much that this is now a staple in my house. This is the best thing I've done for him since he was diagnosed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with kidney cats
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several cats and have friends who vets have recommended their kidney cats start taking. I very much believe that this product helps our kidney cats slow down the progression of the disease and help with better kidney function. There's no stopping the disease, but every little bit of help I'll take.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be effective.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's kind of hard to ask my cat how he feels, but since I started giving him this supplement he's shown no more outward signs of kidney disease. Of course I still have his next visit to the vet to go into further details, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wita

customer_reviews.title: Back to normal in a month
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats had borderline kidney issues, and a month on AminAvast resolved them. His blood work is now normal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AminAvast has helped our elderly cat thrive, despite kidney disease
customer_reviews.text: Our fussy eating cat tolerates and even seems to like this supplement when sprinkled on her food. She has had kidney disease for over a year. This supplement seems to help her maintain function. It was shipped quickly and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MarileeTop Contributor: Weaving

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cat!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old cat has kidney disease and I purchased this from the Vet the first time. Cost is much less with Amazon. This product along with sub q fluids and a homeopathic supplement has made such a difference in my cat’s wellbeing.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kidney disease
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat was diagnosed with kidney disease in Aug of 2017. Thanks to this amazing product, he is still going strong over a year and a half later!

I've been sprinkling a capsule a day on her wet food for about 3 years now - she doesn't mind the taste (if it even has a taste) and, best of all, no kidney issues! Thank you for helping her.

customer_reviews.text: The pills are huge, cats were unable to swallow them. I emptied them into the food and they refused to eat the food. Threw them away.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cats with kidney disease

product_meta.title: AminAvast Kidney Support Supplement for Cats and Dogs, 300mg - Promotes and Supports Natural Kidney Function - Supports Health and Vitality - Easily Administered - 60 Sprinkle Capsules
feature_bullets: See Benefits Within Weeks; owners have reported improvements in their pet's hair coat, appetite, weight gain, behavior and overall quality of life

Daily Support For Renal Health; our proprietary blend of amino acids and a peptide can help support healthy renal function in cats and dogs. No side effects have been reported in cats that have been using AminAvast for both short-term and long-term use

Easy To Administer For Life; our sprinkle capsules can be easily broken and mixed in food to make daily consumption a breeze for your pet. No need for refrigeration and comes with a three-year shelf life

Veterinarian Recommended; clinical studies have shown that dogs’ and cats’ health can improve just weeks after starting the supplement. It may be used in conjunction with other treatments and medications depending on your veterinarian's recommendations

100% Risk-free, Guaranteed; aminAvast, is manufactured in a USA-based, FDA-licensed facility, and we are a proud member of the National Animal Supplement Council (NASC). We are committed to developing products of the highest quality to improve and extend the lives of our companion animals; if your pet is not happy, we’ll refund your money, no questions asked
